channel.title: Blogs on Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Portfolio

item.title: Heartworm Disease
item.description: I know–it’s ghastly! Hello there. This post’s purpose serves to emphasize the importance of having your pets on heartworm prevention. Before moving back to Austin, I worked in a small animal clinic in San Antonio in which I had the pleasure of looking after cats and dogs. One of my objectives as a veterinary technician assistant was to instruct owners on the benefits of different kinds of vaccines, the importance of heartworm tests once a year, and most importantly, the need for heartworm prevention.

item.title: Python and R
item.description: R-Studio and Python are both fantastic coding programs that have the ability to work in tandem to share objects. These can be used for manipulation in one language and visualization in the other, or vice versa. A simple example of this interaction is illustrated here: First, we have to use the package ‘reticulate’ to tell R to speak to Python, then add an object in R to be used by a Python chunk.
